snippet.title: Medal of Honor: Above and Beyond - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Charge into history in Medal of Honor: Above and Beyond, the new VR first person shooter from Respawn Entertainment.  https://www.oculus.com/medal-of-honor/ 

Return to the beloved franchise in an entirely new way. A deep single-player campaign takes you through historic events on land, air, and sea, sabotaging Nazi bases, subverting enemy plans, aiding the French Resistance, and much, much more. Learn more about the true history of WWII with the Gallery: a powerful collection of short documentary films featuring WWII veterans you’ll be able to view within the game. And hone your skills in five robust multiplayer modes on sites across Europe. Master the distinctive handling and reloading of a host of WWII weapons and test yourself against human and AI opponents in high-tempo 12 player matches. Ready to rise to the fight?

Medal of Honor: Above and Beyond is available now. Get it on Oculus or Steam VR here: https://www.oculus.com/medal-of-honor/journal/available-now/ 

Learn more about the development of the game and how the Medal of Honor franchise is returning to its roots here: https://www.oculus.com/medal-of-honor/beyond-the-cover/ 

Follow Medal of Honor here:
https://twitter.com/medalofhonor 
https://oculus.com/medalofhonor 

#MedalofHonor #AboveandBeyond #LaunchTrailer
